Test class module

Script that defines the Tester class which is used to test the model performance on the test set

class test.Tester(dataset, ks='[10, 20, 50]')

Bases: object

test(ua_embeddings, ia_embeddings, batch_size, is_val, batch_test_flag=False)

Test the performance of the model

Parameters:

  • ua_embeddings (torch.Tensor) – user embeddings

  • ia_embeddings (torch.Tensor) – item embeddings

  • batch_size (int) – batch size

  • is_val (bool) – bool, validation flag

  • batch_test_flag (bool) – bool, batch test flag

Returns:

result of the model performance

Return type:

dict

test_one_user(x, test_flag='part')

Test the performance of the model for one user

Parameters:

  • x – list, user u’s ratings for user u

  • test_flag – str, test flag

Returns:

performance: dict

Return type:

dict
